kpi.cnname: 工单号, 地区名称,工单信息, 派单时间, 处理环节
kpi.sql: select m1.sheetid,m1.id,getareaname(m1.todeptid) areaname,m1.title,m1.sendtime,decode(m1.status,'0','运行中','1' ,'已归档') dealname from commonfault_main m1 where m1.sendtime >to_date('{2}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and m1.sendtime<to_date('{1}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and m1.status in (0,1) and m1.deleted=0 and m1.todeptid='{0}'
